title: As Schools Buy More Local Food, Kids Throw Less Food In The Trash
text:
As Schools Buy More Local Food, Kids Throw Less Food In The Trash 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
More and more schools are trying to serve meals with food that was grown nearby. The U.S. Department of Agriculture just released some stati...
